DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether embryo transfer day 3 versus day 5 show significant difference implantation , clinical pregnancy , live birth , miscarriage multiple pregnancy rate among woman least two previous IVF failure
DOC.brief_title: Comparison 5 Day Embryo Transfer With 2-3 Day Transfer Patients With Previous In Vitro Fertilization Failure
DOC.detailed_description: A total 200 infertile woman least two previous IVF failure enroll prospective randomize clinical trial study randomly divide two group . Random permute block block size 4 used ensure randomization complete allocation concealment . The study protocol assess independent institutional review board Royan ethic committee . Ovarian stimulation protocol include use GnRH agonist ( Superfact ; Aventis Pharma Deutshlan , Frankfurt , Germany ) administer long ( down-regulation ) protocol subsequent addition FSH ( Gonal F , Sereno , Switzerland ) . Embryos initially culture G1.V5 medium ) Vitrolife-Sweden ) TM day 1 2 , transfer medium G2.V5 ) Vitrolife-Sweden ) TM day 3 . Embryos transfer day 5 , depend degree expansion blastocyst . Main outcome measure implantation , clinical pregnancy live birth rate .
